DOC.criteria: 1 . You schedule MRI ( magnetic resonance imaging ) scan use contrast agent EOVIST . 2 . Male female 21 year age old . 1 . Does contraindication MRI ( e.g . cardiac pacemaker , ferromagnetic metallic implant ) . 2 . Pregnancy
